Room.Name: Eidenhoft/Hillcrest/Marina Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the three-way intersection of Eidenhoft Boulevard, Hillcrest Drive and Marina Way.
Room.LongDescription: Three major roads come together at this intersection. Marina Way runs from the south end of town all the way to Nylandian Bay and into the harbor. Hillcrest is a long road which travels from the west City Wall to the east City Wall, going through three major sections of town. Eidenhoft Boulevard is a strange road which leads through most of Oceancrest's famous monuments.
